So Tai stacked the cement blocks against the house and cleared more space, placing the blocks down again the following day. But this time he discovered the ground was not level enough, so he again stacked the one hundred blocks against the house. Observing Tai's behavior, his next-door neighbor inquired, 'Tai, do you intend to put your patio away every single night?'
10.instruction: What role does the structure of this piece play?
options: A. The pattern of blocks foreshadows the pattern carried out by Tai.
B. The repetition in Tai's behavior creates a pattern that enables a joke.
C. The narrative structure reveals Tai's process in building the patio.
